Our Products

Home

>>

Products

Innovative Products Defining Tomorrow's Success

Process Equipment
HVAC - R Coils
Plate Heat Exchangers
Process Equipment

Shell and Tube Heat Exchanger

We are capable to manufacturing shell and tube heat exchangers with high quality and extensive material options i.e., CS, SS, Duplex, Super Duplex, Inconel, and titanium. Our design and fabrication facilities offer fast, efficient, and cost-effective solutions. We have in-house thermal and mechanical design experts. Our automatic tube sheet drilling equipment is accurate to ±0.01″ and up to 400mm thickness drill capacity.

We offer all standard TEMA configurations i.e., BEM, AEN, AES, NEN, BKU and BEU type designed in accordance with ASME Code, Section VIII, Division 1 & 2 and TEMA requirements. Shell sizes range from 4″ up to 110″ in diameter with up to 75mm thk. and design pressures from full vacuum to 5000 PSI.

  • FIXED TUBE SHEETS HEAT EXCHANGERS
  • FLOATING HEAD TUBE SHEET HEAT EXCHANGERS
  • U- TUBE HEAT EXCHANGERS
  • KETTLE TYPE RE-BOILER
  • COAXIAL TUBE HEAT EXCHANGERS
  • FIN TUBE HEAT EXCHANGERS
Contact Sales

Inquire Now

Pressure Vessel

We provide a wide range of pressure vessels adhering to stringent quality and safety standards for a diverse selection of clients in the oil, gas and petrochemical industry, including: Design ASME SEC VIII Div 1 & 2, ASME SEC II, manufacturing, and fabrication & Detailed Engineering in Horizontal / Vertical Design.
  • Pressurized Air Receiver
  • Separators, Receivers and Condensers
  • Knockout Drums
  • High Pressure Production Trap
  • Scrubber Drums
  • De-Cock Drums
Contact Sales

Inquire Now

Fin Fan Coolers and Customized Industrial Air Coolers

Our fin fan coolers include radial and helical finned tubes with variable material options and optimized design, enabling added heat exchange capability.
We are providing retubing, cleaning and combing of fin tubes, header weld build-up for tapped plugs At Site or In-House, as per customer requirement.

We offer custom designed air-cooled system, that enhances optimum efficiency, performance, and improved reliability for electric motor applications, to overcome heated electric motors that can be inefficient, less effective, and sometime dangerous when pushed to extremes.

Through advanced computer-aided design models and manufacturing techniques, our custom capabilities are unmatched in our industry.

We manufacture:

  • High Finned Tubes Coolers
  • Condenser Type Fin Tube Coolers
  • Industrial Motor Coolers
Contact Sales

Inquire Now

Shop Fabricated Tanks

All Shop fabricated tanks are designed in-house by our team of engineers to industry standards using API 620 and API 650 design codes. With an experienced technical and production staff on hand, Salama has the required depth to design any custom tank to suit any processing application including heavy oil product, water treatment, oil heating & facility operation.

  • Design & Construction as per API 650 , API 620 & AWWA standards
  • Scope includes Design, Procurement, shop fabrication, Prefabrication & site erection.
  • Media of storage Crude Oil, Fuel Oil, Chemicals & Water.
  • Erection by conventional & Jacking method.
  • MOC Carbon Steel & Stainless Steel.
  • Diameter up to 10m & height up to 30m
  • Fixed Conical & Dome Roof
Contact Sales

Inquire Now

Piping Spool Fabrication

We are equipped with various types, sizes and orientation of piping spool fabrication. We fabricate pipe spools for various applications in oil, gas, petrochemical, chemical and water lines.

Our welders are fully qualified on a wide range of welding specifications and materials, we have various welding procedures that are applicable to most welding applications, which include stainless steel, carbon steel, nickel alloy and duplex etc… using welding techniques i.e. SMAW, TIG, MIG.

  • Pipe Spool Skids: Different dimensions and arrangements.
  • Chemical Injection Skids: High accuracy chemical injectors.
  • Water Injection Skids: Water injection applications at best.
  • Welding Process Skids: Processes like SMAW, TIG, MIG for various materials.
Contact Sales

Inquire Now

Skids

Salama Engineering Industries provides chilled water-cooling skids, chemical dosing skids, cooling, and heating water injection systems for various industrial application.

Skids are designed, engineered, fabricated, assembled & tested under one roof at our Facility.

  • Cold Water Skids: Efficient industrial water cooling solutions.
  • Chemical Dispensing Skids: Precise chemical dosing systems.
  • Water Injection Skids: Controlled water injection systems.
  • Modular Process Skids: Compact, multi-function process units.
Contact Sales

Inquire Now
HVAC - R Coils

Condenser Coils

We design and manufacture coils with different types of fins and tube materials with various thicknesses. Mostly copper, aluminum fins and pre coated aluminum fins are being used. Different types of refrigerants (Condenser and Evaporator coils), liquids (Chilled water / glycol coils and Hot water / glycol coils ), fluids ( Steam coils and air charge coils )
  • Copper Condenser Coils: Strong structure offers high heat exchanger effectiveness
  • Aluminum Condenser Coils: Highly portable yet good with heat dynamics
  • Pre-Coated Aluminum Coils: Avoids corrosion in extreme environments
  • Multi-Fluid Compatible Coils: Engineered for use with steam, water, and air applications.
Contact Sales

Inquire Now

Direct Expansion (DX) Coils

We design and manufacture Evaporator (Direct Expansion – DX) Coils for HVAC equipment. Singles, dual / quad compressor circuits are available. We can supply all types of rows as well as interlaced circuiting, which provides the highest precision in capacity control.

We design coils with special connectors, distributors, and framework designed to meet the customer requirements. Our unique interlaced circuiting options assure uniform refrigerant distribution over the entire face area of the coil. Wide fin spacing availability reduces the effect of frost build-up on low temperature applications. Standard or custom-built direct expansion cooling coils (evaporators) are manufactured for a wide variety of applications.

  • Single comprised Circuit DX Coils: preferred in compact setups.
  • Double Circuit DX Coils: offers more efficiency and capacity.
  • Quad Circuit DX Coils: the most preferable in cases of high productivity.
  • Custom DX Coils: bespoke designs aimed at unique specifications.
Contact Sales

Inquire Now

AHU Chilled Water Coils / FCU Coils

We design and manufacture AHU/FCU Coils for HVAC equipment. CHW and DX type of AHU/FCU coils can be manufactured. All our coils are designed as per AHRI- certified selection software. This ensures our customers receive optimum performance for size characteristics, helping to deliver cost effective solutions. With our wide ranges of fin patterns, tube sizes & patterns, coils can either be uniquely designed to maximize performance at minimal cost or designed as a direct replacement unit without affecting existing client designs. Air Handling Units (AHU), Fan Coil Units (FCU), Heat Recovery Systems (Run-around coils), Air-cooled Condensers / Air-cooled Chillers.
  • AHU Coils CHW/HW/DX : Used for cooling applications, heating applications For direct expansion cooling
  • Chilled water / glycol coils and Hot water / glycol coils
  • Steam coils
  • Heating and cooling coils
Contact Sales

Inquire Now

Bend Coils

We design and manufacture bend type Coils for HVAC equipment with different types of fins and tube materials, and designs with various thickness.

Mostly copper, aluminum fins and pre coated aluminum fins are being used to assemble these coils based on their functions and applications.

  • U-Bend Coils: Ideal for compact spaces.
  • Spiral Bend Coils: Enhanced heat transfer.
  • Serpentine Coils: Suitable for complex configurations.
  • Helical Bend Coils: Optimized for uniform air distribution.
  • Dual Circuit Coils: For simultaneous heating and cooling.
  • Full Circle Coils: Best for 360-degree airflow applications.
Contact Sales

Inquire Now

Heat Pipes

Salama has the capability to design, manufacture and install the Heat pipes. Salama’s HRHPs are designed to be hassle-free with ‘plug and play’ technology. Heat pipes are passive devices without moving parts. The fins shall be of the rippled or louvered type to suit the application. Tubes shall be of refrigeration standard seamless copper and options for external fins shall be of aluminum and Copper.

  • HSHP (HORSESHOE HEAT PIPE)
  • HRHP (HEAT RECOVERY HEAT PIPE) Vertical & Horizontal Orientation
Contact Sales
